      • getComments

        @GET
 @Produces(value={"application/json","application/xml"})
public List<Comment> getComments(@QueryParam(value="numberOfComments") @DefaultValue(value="25")
                                                                                               int numberOfComments,
                                                                                               @QueryParam(value="startIndex") @DefaultValue(value="0")
                                                                                               Long startIndex,
                                                                                               @QueryParam(value="post_id")
                                                                                               Long post_id)
                                                                                        throws IOException,
                                                                                               AppException
        Parameters:
        numberOfComments - -optional -default is 25 -the size of the List to be returned
        startIndex - -optional -default is 0 -the id of the post you would like to start reading from
        group_id - -optional -if set will attempt to get the requested number of posts from a group.
        Throws:
        IOException
        AppException
